articles.author: James Ashworth
articles.title: Fossil reveals smallest sauropodomorph dinosaur from the Jurassic - Phys.org
articles.description: A tiny relative of titanosaurs has been uncovered in South Africa.
articles.content:
A tiny relative of titanosaurs has been uncovered in South Africa.
Weighing in at around 75 kilograms, the dinosaur would have barely been heavier than the average person. Its small size meant that … [+5822 chars]
